helpdesk_ticket.description:
Dear PharmEasy Customer Support,

I am writing to express my extreme frustration regarding an unfulfilled
order placed on November 26th that has not yet been delivered. This order
contains critical, time-sensitive heart medication that is unavailable in
local stores.

I have repeatedly contacted your customer service executives, but each time
I am simply told to wait, which is unacceptable. I have been completely out
of this critical medication for the last five days, and no solution or
support has been provided by your team. I must ask who will take
responsibility should a serious health issue arise due to this delay.

I urgently require an immediate resolution to this issue. Please find the
order details below.

Please be aware that if a satisfactory resolution is not provided
immediately, I intend to share this entire service incident on LinkedIn to
inform other potential customers.


Order Details: 652716563622387712
Contact Number: 9780624350


Regards
Ridham Goyal

--

notes.body: Hello Mahesh,     Greetings from PharmEasy!      With regards to your order #656184527843823616-48685, the estimated delivery date is 12th December to 15th December 2025.      I would like to inform you that the estimated date of delivery depends on the availability of the medicines and the delivery pin code. Also, be informed, PharmEasy will always try to ensure that your order is delivered at the earliest, as we completely understand the urgency of the medicine.     As of now, the speed-up delivery feature is unavailable with us. Once the order is out for delivery, you will receive an SMS with the contact details of the delivery executive along with the 4-digit pin. Once the details are shared with you, you may coordinate with the delivery executive for exact timings.      You may also track your order from here https://flash.boltonline.in/track/shipment-tracking?waybill=FL1182364437 with the AWB number: BSRC4020318705.     For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section.      Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay healthy!     Regards,  Habiba
notes.body_html:
Hello Mahesh,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

With regards to your order #656184527843823616-48685, the estimated delivery date is 12th December to 15th December 2025. 

I would like to inform you that the estimated date of delivery depends on the availability of the medicines and the delivery pin code. Also, be informed, PharmEasy will always try to ensure that your order is delivered at the earliest, as we completely understand the urgency of the medicine.

As of now, the speed-up delivery feature is unavailable with us. Once the order is out for delivery, you will receive an SMS with the contact details of the delivery executive along with the 4-digit pin. Once the details are shared with you, you may coordinate with the delivery executive for exact timings. 

You may also track your order from here https://flash.boltonline.in/track/shipment-tracking?waybill=FL1182364437 with the AWB number: BSRC4020318705.

For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section. 

Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay healthy!

Regards,
Habiba

Once the details are shared with you, you may coordinate with the delivery executive for exact timings. 

You may also track your order from here https://flash.boltonline.in/track/shipment-tracking?waybill=FL1182364437 with the AWB number: BSRC4020318705.

For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section. 

Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay healthy!

helpdesk_ticket.description:
Dear Sir/Madam,


I hope this message finds you well.


I am writing to you as a loyal Pharmeasy customer. I have been regularly
purchasing medicines and availing lab services through Pharmeasy since
2021, and I also hold a Prime Membership. All medical tests prescribed for
our family have always been done through your platform, and we have been
satisfied with the services provided.

In May 2025, I had ordered medicines for my father. He suffered a brain
haemorrhage in 2021, which resulted in left-side paralysis. With time,
physiotherapy, and medicines, he gradually became capable of performing
small tasks independently and used a walker to move within the house.


Unfortunately, on *9th June 2025*, he had a fall at home and became
unconscious. He was immediately hospitalized and kept on a ventilator. He
was discharged on *14th June 2025*, and since then, we were administering
medicines and taking care of him at home. However, despite all efforts, he
sadly passed away on *30th August 2025*.


His sudden loss deeply affected our family, and we have been going through
emotional as well as financial hardships. After two months, as we are
gradually trying to return to our routine, I am now working on stabilizing
our family’s expenses.

As the only earning member of my family and with two daughters studying in
school, I kindly request your support. I wish to return the unused
medicines purchased for my late father and request that they be replaced
with medicines required for my mother, if possible. This support will truly
help us during this difficult time.


The unused medicines available with us are:

   1. Telmikind Beta 50 – 2 strips
   2. Gabanyl 100 – 2 Strips
   3. Gabapin 100 – 5 strips
   4. Newhenz D – 1 strip
   5. Ecosprin AV 75 – 1 strip
   6. *Leofine 5 – 4 strip*


I have attached my late father's hospital discharge summary and death
certificate for verification purposes.


I sincerely hope Pharmeasy will consider my request compassionately and
extend support to a long-term loyal customer.


Thank you for your time, understanding, and cooperation. I look forward to
a positive response.


Warm regards,


*Vaibhav Sonje*

*9967535126*

--

helpdesk_ticket.subject: Request for Return/Replacement of Unused Medicines Purchased for My Late Father
helpdesk_ticket.description_html:
Dear Sir/Madam,

I hope this message finds you well.

I am writing to you as a loyal Pharmeasy customer. I have been regularly purchasing medicines and availing lab services through Pharmeasy since 2021, and I also hold a Prime Membership. All medical tests prescribed for our family have always been done through your platform, and we have been satisfied with the services provided.
In May 2025, I had ordered medicines for my father. He suffered a brain haemorrhage in 2021, which resulted in left-side paralysis. With time, physiotherapy, and medicines, he gradually became capable of performing small tasks independently and used a walker to move within the house.

Unfortunately, on 9th June 2025, he had a fall at home and became unconscious. He was immediately hospitalized and kept on a ventilator. He was discharged on 14th June 2025, and since then, we were administering medicines and taking care of him at home. However, despite all efforts, he sadly passed away on 30th August 2025.

His sudden loss deeply affected our family, and we have been going through emotional as well as financial hardships. After two months, as we are gradually trying to return to our routine, I am now working on stabilizing our family’s expenses.
As the only earning member of my family and with two daughters studying in school, I kindly request your support. I wish to return the unused medicines purchased for my late father and request that they be replaced with medicines required for my mother, if possible. This support will truly help us during this difficult time.

The unused medicines available with us are:
  1. Telmikind Beta 50 – 2 strips
  2. Gabanyl 100 – 2 Strips
  3. Gabapin 100 – 5 strips
  4. Newhenz D – 1 strip
  5. Ecosprin AV 75 – 1 strip
  6. Leofine 5 – 4 strip

I have attached my late father's hospital discharge summary and death certificate for verification purposes.

I sincerely hope Pharmeasy will consider my request compassionately and extend support to a long-term loyal customer.

Thank you for your time, understanding, and cooperation. I look forward to a positive response.

Warm regards,

Vaibhav Sonje

 आपके ऑर्डर की शिपमेंट अभी देरी में है, इसलिए मैं आपके लिए फास्ट डिलीवरी के लिए टिकट बना सकता हूँ। कृपया पुष्टि करें कि क्या आप चाहते हैं कि मैं यह प्रक्रिया शुरू करूं।  Customer:  टिकट बनाओ Bot:   आपकी शिपमेंट के लिए फास्ट डिलीवरी का टिकट सफलतापूर्वक बना दिया गया है। हमारी लॉजिस्टिक्स/वेयरहाउस टीम को आपकी डिलीवरी को प्राथमिकता देने के लिए सूचित कर दिया गया है। टिकट आईडी है: 22265101। कृपया थोड़ा इंतजार करें, आपकी डिलीवरी जल्द ही हो जाएगी।

helpdesk_ticket.description:
Hi Team/ Himanshu,

I am writing to escalate a serious service failure regarding my recent lab
test booking through the PharmEasy app.

*Booking Details:*

   - Test Date: December 5th, 2024
   - Patient Name : Pretty Singh
   - Order ID : 6230976
   - Test Name : TB - Quantiferon
   - Service: Home sample collection
   - Expected Report Date: December 8th, 2024

*Issue Summary:*

On December 5th, your technician visited my home to collect samples. I was
informed that my report would be available by December 8th. However, when I
did not receive my report by the due date, I contacted your support team on
December 9th to check the status.

During this call, I was shocked to learn that my test had been *cancelled
by the laboratory*.

*My Concerns:*

   1. *Zero Communication*: Despite the cancellation, I received absolutely
   no notification via call, SMS, email, or app alert. Your team failed to
   inform me proactively about this critical issue.
   2. *Discovered Only Upon Follow-up*: Had I not taken the initiative to
   call your support team, I would still be waiting indefinitely for a report
   that would never arrive.
   3. *Inconvenience and Time Wasted*: I scheduled the home collection,
   provided my sample, and waited for results, only to discover the entire
   process was rendered meaningless without any intimation from your end.
   4. *Potential Health Impact*: Lab tests are often urgent medical
   requirements. This delay and lack of communication could have serious
   health implications.

*Immediate Actions Required:*

   1. A detailed explanation of why my test was cancelled by the laboratory
   2. *Full refund of the amount paid* for this test
   3. Compensation for the inconvenience, time wasted, and breach of trust
   4. Written confirmation of the above resolutions

I do not wish to reschedule or use your services again due to this
extremely poor experience and loss of trust in your organization.

This level of service is unacceptable and reflects poorly on PharmEasy's
commitment to customer care. I expect a response and resolution within 24
hours.

Thanks & Regards,

Devesh Kumar Singh

Contact No. : 9560012548

--

helpdesk_ticket.description_html:
Hi Team/ Himanshu,
I am writing to escalate a serious service failure regarding my recent lab test booking through the PharmEasy app.
Booking Details:
  • Test Date: December 5th, 2024
  • Patient Name : Pretty Singh
  • Order ID : 6230976 
  • Test Name : TB - Quantiferon
  • Service: Home sample collection 
  • Expected Report Date: December 8th, 2024
Issue Summary:
On December 5th, your technician visited my home to collect samples. I was informed that my report would be available by December 8th. However, when I did not receive my report by the due date, I contacted your support team on December 9th to check the status.
During this call, I was shocked to learn that my test had been cancelled by the laboratory.
My Concerns:
  1. Zero Communication: Despite the cancellation, I received absolutely no notification via call, SMS, email, or app alert. Your team failed to inform me proactively about this critical issue.
  2. Discovered Only Upon Follow-up: Had I not taken the initiative to call your support team, I would still be waiting indefinitely for a report that would never arrive.
  3. Inconvenience and Time Wasted: I scheduled the home collection, provided my sample, and waited for results, only to discover the entire process was rendered meaningless without any intimation from your end.
  4. Potential Health Impact: Lab tests are often urgent medical requirements. This delay and lack of communication could have serious health implications.
Immediate Actions Required:
  1. A detailed explanation of why my test was cancelled by the laboratory
  2. Full refund of the amount paid for this test
  3. Compensation for the inconvenience, time wasted, and breach of trust
  4. Written confirmation of the above resolutions
I do not wish to reschedule or use your services again due to this extremely poor experience and loss of trust in your organization.
This level of service is unacceptable and reflects poorly on PharmEasy's commitment to customer care. I expect a response and resolution within 24 hours.
Thanks & Regards,
Devesh Kumar Singh
Contact No. : 9560012548

Hi Team/ Himanshu,

I am writing to escalate a serious service failure regarding my recent lab
test booking through the PharmEasy app.

*Booking Details:*

   - Test Date: December 5th, 2024
   - Patient Name : Pretty Singh
   - Order ID : 6230976
   - Test Name : TB - Quantiferon
   - Service: Home sample collection
   - Expected Report Date: December 8th, 2024

*Issue Summary:*

On December 5th, your technician visited my home to collect samples. I was
informed that my report would be available by December 8th. However, when I
did not receive my report by the due date, I contacted your support team on
December 9th to check the status.

During this call, I was shocked to learn that my test had been *cancelled
by the laboratory*.

*My Concerns:*

   1. *Zero Communication*: Despite the cancellation, I received absolutely
   no notification via call, SMS, email, or app alert. Your team failed to
   inform me proactively about this critical issue.
   2. *Discovered Only Upon Follow-up*: Had I not taken the initiative to
   call your support team, I would still be waiting indefinitely for a report
   that would never arrive.
   3. *Inconvenience and Time Wasted*: I scheduled the home collection,
   provided my sample, and waited for results, only to discover the entire
   process was rendered meaningless without any intimation from your end.
   4. *Potential Health Impact*: Lab tests are often urgent medical
   requirements. This delay and lack of communication could have serious
   health implications.

*Immediate Actions Required:*

   1. A detailed explanation of why my test was cancelled by the laboratory
   2. *Full refund of the amount paid* for this test
   3. Compensation for the inconvenience, time wasted, and breach of trust
   4. Written confirmation of the above resolutions

I do not wish to reschedule or use your services again due to this
extremely poor experience and loss of trust in your organization.

This level of service is unacceptable and reflects poorly on PharmEasy's
commitment to customer care. I expect a response and resolution within 24
hours.

notes.body: Hello Rohit,     Greetings from PharmEasy!  With reference to your personal data deletion request, I am sorry to inform you that we are unable to delete the account from our database. As we have to show all transactions or interactions, past or present when asked for by relevant Government authorities.    However, kindly confirm with us if you wish to deactivate the account or want to stop receiving promotional SMS/Emails so that we can check and do the needful at the earliest.  Let me inform you that, once the account is deactivated then we cannot process any request or reactivate the account. Once confirmed our team will reach out to complete the account deactivation process on a registered mobile number to confirm if you requested account deactivation. If yes, OTP will be generated and will be sent to your registered mobile number. Once the OTP is shared by you to the team then will go ahead and block your account.   Awaiting your response.        Regards,  ​Tahera
notes.body_html:
Hello Rohit,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

With reference to your personal data deletion request, I am sorry to inform you that we are unable to delete the account from our database. As we have to show all transactions or interactions, past or present when asked for by relevant Government authorities. 
 
However, kindly confirm with us if you wish to deactivate the account or want to stop receiving promotional SMS/Emails so that we can check and do the needful at the earliest.

Let me inform you that, once the account is deactivated then we cannot process any request or reactivate the account. Once confirmed our team will reach out to complete the account deactivation process on a registered mobile number to confirm if you requested account deactivation. If yes, OTP will be generated and will be sent to your registered mobile number. Once the OTP is shared by you to the team then will go ahead and block your account. 

Awaiting your response.

Regards,
​Tahera

notes.body: Hello Alok,     Greetings from PharmEasy!  We are pleased to inform you that the invoice for Order ID #647321530123702272-26386 has been successfully rectified. If you require any further assistance, please feel free to reach out to us through the support channels available on our app or website under the “Need Help” section. notes.body_html:
